definition: to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off
rampart/base (in baseball)/to build with stones, bricks etc

sentences.english: Tom's hit brought in both base runners.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的擊球使兩名跑壘員得了分。

sentences.english: He also decides when runners are safe or out at the bases.
sentences.chinese: 同時他還判定跑壘員是安全還是出局。

sentences.english: The runner tried to get to the base, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 跑壘員試圖想跑回本壘，但已經太遲了。

sentences.english: The runner was called safe when the baseman dropped the ball.
sentences.chinese: 當一壘手丟球時，跑壘員就真的安全了。
